reviews.review: El juego es bastante bueno a pesar de los existentes bugs, hay ocasiones donde se inicia la animacion de atrapar a un superviviente en medio de un salto de ventana pero el cruza, cuando ya esta del otro lado por medio de la fuerza el asesino (de tu eleccion) lo coloca en su hombro para disponerse a colgarlo, eso me da bastante risa
This is a great game for horror fans ;>

Good game if you want to play friends, survivor is fun. As killer it  takes sometimes long to get into a game but that's only with the rank 1. pallets are nice to use. there is a lot of camping killers. Especially in the lower ranks sometimes even in the higher ranks. Game is alot of fun  just get some friends.
Entretenido
its a game, put time into it and have fun
Dont know what to write in a review, but if you like friday the 13th you will MOST LIKEY love this game.

Le moins que l'on puisse dire c'est que la communaut√© de Dead by Daylight est unique en son genre ! Le syst√®me √©conomique du jeu est tr√®s √©labor√©, en effet les d√©veloppeurs n'ont pas choisi l'option d'un pay to win. En conclusion de mon avis ne servant pas √† grand chose et compl√®tement absurde, je vous pose la question :

This game is surprisingly fun and has a surprising amount of depth. The only place I would recommend the game is on PC because of its abysmal performance on console, but on PC, it's certainly worth a go!

10/10 I'm completely addicted! Its fun on your own or with friends, and there is no limitation to how much you can play. There are also frequent events, for example double bloodpoints which helps you level up your characters.
